attributes.action: Restrict or block access to WikiLeaks
attributes.additional_details:
Dear all,

I propose to the house, to enforce an immediate block or take down of the WikiLeaks global infrastructure.

My proposal is backed by many thousands of people and the common knowledge that they exists to only disrupt and foil secure communications and to reveal highly sensitive information. A crime in many countries.

Surely that now there is a warrant out for Julian Assange's arrest, any property, digital or hard, should be seized or destroyed.

The highly damaging information that has been revealed on their may have set back Global Counter Terrorism Intelligence 5 years or more.

Please, action something of this kind.

Regards,

O.
